title: Did the judge give the billionaire Jeffrey Epstein a stakeout after he met with the Clintons?
subtitle: Epstein's relations with two United States Presidents, Bill Clinton and Donald Trump, have attracted a great deal of attention in recent days.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A convicted judge put a registered sex offender Jeffrey Epstein on probation in a sexual trafficking case after a meeting with the Clintons.
